alert.note: Alert for Leake; Madison; Yazoo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 9:22PM CDT until June 25 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Leake County in central Mississippi... Northeastern Yazoo County in central Mississippi... Madison County in central Mississippi... * Until 1045 PM CDT. * At 922 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Kosciusko to Goodman to near Tolarville, moving south at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Cameron around 935 PM CDT. Camden and Singleton around 940 PM CDT. Redwater, Benton and Renfroe around 945 PM CDT. Farmhaven, Vaughan and Edinburg around 950 PM CDT. Way around 955 PM CDT. Standing Pine and Madden around 1000 PM CDT. Walnut Grove and Sharon around 1005 PM CDT. Canton around 1010 PM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
